TITLE: PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION Title: iVerify: Field-to-Ledger Product Verification System

PROVISIONAL PATENT APPLICATION
Title: iVerify: Field-to-Ledger Product Verification System

FIELD OF THE INVENTION
This invention relates generally to systems and methods for verifying the origin, handling, and
compliance conditions of agricultural and/or mined products. More particularly, the invention provides
an integrated, multi-step process that combines physical verification methods, compliance monitoring,
and blockchain-based custody records with optional payment and market access tools for small-scale
producers, especially in low-connectivity regions.

BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION
Industries such as agriculture and artisanal or small-scale mining (ASM) face strict buyer and regulatory
requirements to prove product origin, handling practices, and absence of prohibited activities such as
child labor. Regulations like the European Union Deforestation Regulation (EUDR) and conflict mineral
laws require verifiable mapping, monitoring, and chain-of-custody documentation.
While individual technologies such as GPS mapping or tamper-evident seals exist, they are often
deployed in isolation, require continuous internet access, or are tailored to large-scale corporate
buyers. Smallholders and ASM producers lack integrated tools that meet these compliance
requirements while also enabling direct participation in premium markets.
There is a need for an integrated, modular system and process that operates in low-connectivity
environments, captures verifiable data at multiple points, binds that data to an immutable record, and
uses that record to facilitate payments and market storytelling.
